Wisdom: الْفَقْرُ الْفَادِحُ أَجْمَلُ مِنَ الْغِنَى الْفَاضِحِ
enWisdom: Extreme poverty is better than disgraceful affluence

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْيَسِيرَ مِنَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ لَأَكْرَمُ مِنَ الْكَثِيرِ مِنْ خَلْقِهِ
enWisdom: Verily the little that is from Allah, the Glorified, is more valuable than the plenty [that is gotten] from His creatures
Many a thing that is little grows and develops much more than that which is plenty

Wisdom: قَلِيلٌ لَكَ خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرٍ لِغَيْرِكَ
enWisdom: Little that belongs to you is better than plenty that belongs to others

Wisdom: قَلِيلٌ تُحْمَدُ مَغَبَّتُهُ خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرٍ تَضُرُّ عَاقِبَتُهُ
enWisdom: Little with a praised outcome is better than plenty with a harmful consequence

Wisdom: قَلِيلٌ يُفْتَقَرُ إِلَيْهِ خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرٍ يُسْتَغْنَى عَنْهُ
enWisdom: The little that one is in need of is better than the plenty that one is needless of

Wisdom: قَلِيلٌ يَخِفُّ عَلَيْكَ عَمَلُهُ خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرٍ تَسْتَثْقِلُ حَمْلَهُ
enWisdom: Little which is easy for you to act upon is better than a lot that is too heavy for you to bear

Wisdom: قَلِيلٌ يَكْفِي خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرٍ يُطْغِي
enWisdom: Little [wealth] that suffices is better than a lot which makes one insolent

Wisdom: قَلِيلٌ يُنْجِي خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرٍ يُرْدِي
enWisdom: The little that saves [one from hellfire] is better than plenty that destroys

Wisdom: يَسِيرٌ يَكْفِي خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرٍ يُطْغِي
enWisdom: Little that suffices is better than a lot which makes one insolent

Wisdom: يَسِيرُ الدُّنْيَا خَيْرٌ مِنْ كَثِيرِهَا وَبُلْغَتُهَا أَجْدَرُ مِنْ هَلَكَتِهَا
enWisdom: Little of this world is better than plenty of it, and that of it which suffices for subsistence in it is better than that which destroys
